titleStmt.title: To the honorable the House of Commons, now assembled in Parliament. The humble petition of the inhabitants of VVatford, in the county of Hertford.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: for John Bellamy and Ralph Smith,

notesStmt.note: Offers 50 serviceable horses and riders and recommends John Bird as captain. -- Steele.
Read, approved, and ordered to be printed by the House of Commons Die Veneris 1. Julii. 1642. Order to print signed: H. Elsynge Cler. Parl. Do. Com.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
